void Photon.Pun.UtilityScripts.CullingHandler.OnPhotonSerializeView (PhotonStream stream, PhotonMessageInfo info)
This time OnPhotonSerializeView is not used to send or receive any kind of data.
It is used to change the currently active group of the PhotonView component, making it work together with PUN more directly. Keep in mind that this function is only executed, when there is at least one more player in the room.
Implements Photon.Pun.IPunObservable.
